entries.meaning: (organic chemistry) Any salt of a resin acid

verbs.description: resinate (third-person singular simple present resinates, present participle resinating, simple past and past participle resinated)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To treat a container with resin, e.g. by impregnation in order to impart flavour, typically of wine, and to provide a tighter seal on the container.
